thread.title: David Rollinson appointed Managing Director of SVM Global

author: cnbc.com
title: David Rollinson appointed Managing Director of SVM Global
text:
ARLINGTON HEIGHTS, Ill., March 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- SVM, LP, a leading provider of gift and prepaid cards for the incentive industry, announced today it has appointed David Rollinson to the position of Managing Director for its global office based in Rotherham, South Yorkshire, UK. He will report to Dan Grotto, SVM's Executive Vice President.
Rollinson is SVM's third high-profile hire in recent months signalling company growth and his hiring comes at an opportune time as the global gift and prepaid card sector is accelerating. Recently, SVM hired Tan Truong as its CTO and Chris Larson as its VP of Finance, Prepaid Products.
As Managing Director, Rollinson will direct all facets of a robust pipeline that will drive the next stage of SVM Global's growth.
Grotto said, "In working with some of the world's largest brands in the retail, consumer packaged goods and healthcare sectors, David brings a unique perspective to the loyalty, award and promotions channel and his demonstrated leadership capabilities will be instrumental to him achieving the ambitious goals we have set for SVM Global."
Marshall Reavis, SVM's founder and Chief Executive Officer added, "I'm excited to welcome David to the SVM Global team. We have a dedicated and experienced team in Rotherham, across all disciplines, many loyal customers and I look forward to the immediate impact David will have leading our valued global employees and getting to know and service our partners."
When discussing his new position Rollinson said, "I am honored and excited to lead the SVM Global team. The commitment of everyone in this company to integrity, client service and unique technology solutions is what makes this organization special. I also look forward to working with my colleagues in the U.S. to leverage our team's mutual knowledge of the incentive space and to service our international brands and customers."
Prior to joining SVM, David worked at Coca-Cola, Mars, Sara Lee Bakeries and Handleman. His most recent role was as Managing Director for NBTY with responsibilities for the UK, South Africa and New Zealand markets.

About SVM
Founded in 1997, SVM is a global leader in providing innovative gift card solutions for businesses. SVM is the only company that offers gasoline gift cards from every major oil company in America, as well as over 250 of the most popular retail stores, restaurants, service companies and hotels, and now prepaid promotional and reward cards. SVM's products are used by leading incentive, rewards, loyalty and other companies to incent and reward their customers, employees, and prospects. For more information on SVM, please visit www.svmcards.com .
